item.title: Book Review: Myth's to Live By
item.description: We are all the heroes of our own personal myths. No surprise there. What is really surprising is that all of our myths follow the same basic story arc. At least, this is the claim of Joseph Campbell, whose research into the mythologies of the world over has revealed that all cultures have strikingly similar mythâ€™s underlying the basic fabric of society, the guide the development of the members of that society.
